name: JustPhysics
description:
Controls: Hold Left Mouse Button to pick up the object, Hold R while dragging object to rotate. Also while dragging if you hold the object and press the Right Mouse Button to freeze object.

Supporting Us:

If you want to support us then check out our other games here

https://rivelbop.itch.io/

You can also support us by subscribing to our channel right here!!!

https://www.youtube.com/@rivelbop

Improtant: There is more content to the game if you hit the material text, the small stuff text, and the danger text. There will be many more things to mess around with.
